task.title: How to Sign Up for Personal Training Sessions
task.shortdesc: If you have decided that you want to participate in personal training, follow these steps to sign up and pay for the sessions you want.

step.cmd: Visit the Rec Sports website and log in using your PID.
Under the section titled "category" on the lefthand side of the page, click on the "personal training" tab to view only the personal training packages.
Click on the package you want to sign up for and click "add to cart."
If you want to look for more packages, click "continue shopping."
If you want to remove the item from you cart, click "remove."
When you are happy with your purchase, click "checkout."
Insert your payment information and review your order before purchasing.

taskbody.postreq: If a session is ever canceled, you will be issued a full refund. If you have a documented medical condition that no longer allows you to complete your sessions, a refund may be issued and will include a $10 processing fee. You must send a request and medical notice to the assistant director for fitness programs. If you have any other questions about the refund policy, contact recsports@vt.edu.
